titles.title: Cost of Police Misconduct Act of 2020
Cost of Police Misconduct Act of 2020
To require Federal, State, and local law enforcement agencies to report information related to allegations of misconduct of law enforcement officers to the Attorney General, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Cost of Police Misconduct Act of 2020
This bill requires the Department of Justice to collect and make publicly available certain information from federal, state, and local law enforcement agencies about allegations of misconduct by law enforcement officers, including the amounts of any relevant settlements. It also directs the Government Accountability Office to study costs and other issues related to such misconduct.
